name: Arnold
description:
Features
  • Explore locations with a variety of traps.
  • Shoot at dangerous opponents.
  • Open the doors.
  • Shoot turrets (homing guns).
  • Teleport the spaceship to the next level.
  • Shoot and Dodge bullets.
  • Destroy enemies, collect first aid kits and teleport the ship to a new level.
  • Learn the level and destroy your opponents.
  • Complete levels and get achievements.
  • Shoot your opponents and collect first aid kits.
  • Teleport the ship to a new level and get achievements.
  • Destroy your opponents enjoy the victory and go to the next level.

History:
Space pilot Arnold goes to a space base to study secret data, but falls into an insidious trap of evil aliens.
